casebody.data:
McCLENNAHAN
v.
SCHOOL OF ARTS. No. 339P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 23, 2006. Thomas J. Ziko, Special Deputy Attorney General, Katherine A. Murphy, Assistant Attorney General, for School of Arts & Pollack. Harvey L. Kennedy, Harold L. Kennedy, III, for McClennahan.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of June 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of June 2006."
